problem.markdown:
Check your understanding after you have gone through the basic theory and the procedure to use the simulator.
1. A right angled V-notch having a depth of water at V-notch as 200mm, calculate the discharge over the notch in liters per minute. Assume coefficient of discharge as 0.62
( ) 1320 liters/min (x) 1560 liters/min ( ) 26 liters/min ( ) 30 liters/min
2. An error of 1% in measuring the head of water over the crest of a triangular notch, produces an error in the discharge which is equal to
( ) 1.5% ( ) 2% ( ) 1.25% (x) 2.5%
3. V-notch is a type of sharp edged weir.(Say true or false)
( ) False (x) True
4. In V-notch the flow area decreases as H _______
( ) Remains same ( ) Decreases (x) Increases ( ) None of the above
5. When θ= 90o and cd= 0.6 for triangular notch, the total discharge can be written as
(x) 14.17H5/2 ( ) 1.417H3/2 ( ) 14.17H3/2 ( ) 1.417H3/2
